children: Webhook providers implement security controls during webhook setup to reduce the risk of webhook exploration to obtain confidential data. All webhook services we researched provide authentication and authorization to set up webhooks in their Admin UIs and APIs.

children: Webhook providers implement security controls on runtime to give consumers ways to validate if notifications are authentic, not tampered with, or replayed.
